title: Velosa
body: The surname Velosa (Olim Avelosa) comes from Gonçalo Anes de Velosa and one of his brothers, natives of Celorico, who were among the first settlers of this island, with the former building the church of S. Bartolomeu, in Funchal.

Celorico: Place of origin of Gonçalo Anes de Velosa

Gonçalo Anes de Velosa: One of the first settlers of the island
